entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
